title: Master Mix Distribute 96 to 384
author: Opentrons
description: Transfer master mix solutions in quadruplicate from a 96 well plate to a 384 well plate
process:
Transfer 8 master mix solutions from row 1 of 96 well plate to all rows on 384 plate
(48 wells of each master mix solution on 384).

markdown.title: Master Mix Distribute 96 to 384

1. Transfer 8 master mix solutions from row 1 of 96 well plate to all rows on 384 plate
(48 wells of each master mix solution on 384).
